name: Stealing Stickman
description:
You have to play the character Stickman. Stick walked down the street, when suddenly an unknown person came up behind him and threw a bag over his head. Stickman woke up in a locked room, where he had to find a way out to freedom.
You will find many doors that need to be opened. Find all successful ways to open doors and escape from this building! We'll have to open the door not only wooden, but also iron and even space! Various variations of scenes and puzzles will make you think and reflect. Interesting graphics and storyline will appeal to all players without exception.
